{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=SBR-AC3200P |series=AC3200 |asin=B01E3VN6IY |price=300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |type=wireless router |fcc_date=10/29/2015 |fcc_id=UIDSBR-AC3200P |ic_id=6670A-SBRAC3200P |pcb_id=BDV00N0D-1.0 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=AC, corded |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0 |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB128M16BP-DI |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=Winbond |ram2_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=G.hn Digital Baseband Processor;Marvell;88LX3142;M, 88LX3142-TFJ2, KJJMT.2JW, 1507 A0E, TW; ,,, 1Gbps G.hn Baseband Analog Front-End;Marvell;88LX2718;M, 88LX2718-NAX2, GRV5911.2JE, 1446 A1E, TW;1; ,,, 2-lane, 2-port PCIe (Gen2) Switch;ASMedia;ASM1182e;ASM1182e, BPV49201A1, 1439;1; |flags=G.hn (PowerLine), 256QAM, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• 2x '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''AC3200'' class'''
{{TagLine|SURFboard AC3200 Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent Technology}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/routers/sbr-ac3200p/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000OlajgAAB}} * Web GUI: http://mysurfboard.local "ARRIS", "SBR-AC3200P/AC1900P", "BDV00N0D-1.0" and "PALWONN" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos (OEM [[SerComm]]). Hardware is shared between this SBR-AC3200P and the SBR-AC1900P :but one BCM43602 radio is not populated in the SBR-AC1900P. ===See also=== *[[Arris SBR-AC3200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac3200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC3200P UIDSBR-AC3200P] (2015-10-29) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6IY B01E3VN6IY] (300$) *[[Arris SBR-AC1900P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1900p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC1900P UIDSBR-AC1900P] (2015-10-22) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6E8 B01E3VN6E8] (200$) *[[Arris SBR-AC1200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Router with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbr-ac1200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBR-AC1200P UIDSBR-AC1200P] (2015-12-18) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6H0 B01E3VN6H0] (120$) *[[Arris SBX-AC1200P]] - ''SURFboard Wi-Fi Hotspot with RipCurrent'' • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbx-ac1200p/ PPage] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/UIDSBX-AC1200P UIDSBX-AC1200P] (2015-12-23) Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN7VA B01E3VN7VA] (100$) *[[Arris SBX-1000P]] - ''SURFboard Wired Network Extender with RipCurrent'' :Amazon: [https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01E3VN6DO B01E3VN6DO] (60$) • [http://www.surfboard.com/products/sbx-1000p/ PPage] __NOTOC__
